long_description: but, for growing organizations in the digital age, a cloud-based content management server is an essential investment. an ecm end user who isn't happy won't use it to its fullest potential â€” compromising both your ecm investment and their productivity. seamlessly connects opentext to any windows desktop or workstation application, so end users can comfortably adopt their ecm, without changing their environment. enables ecm users to continue operating in traditional file explorers, without disruption to existing content server workflows and functionality. with our suite of information management solutions, it's not only easier to interact with your data, it's also easier to make sense of them, navigate them, and action them. we'll create inventories for your structured and unstructured data; establish indexing systems that evolve as you grow; get rid of what you don't need anymore; secure all your important files, and render them searchable for the end-user from one central location. learn more at shinydocs.com.
generated_description: shinydrive is a cloud-based content management server that seamlessly connects opentext to any windows desktop or workstation application, allowing end users to adopt their ecm without changing their environment. it enables ecm users to continue operating in traditional file explorers without disruption to existing content server workflows and functionality. shinydrive invisibly syncs file changes to opentext, preventing duplicate effort, inefficiencies, and frustrations that usually accompany the painful shift to ecm adoption. shinydocs provides direct support to it personnel for efficient installation and configuration, prioritized support within 24 hours, guidance for information architecture to optimize the file access experience, and ongoing 1:1 customer support for upgrades and updates. shinydrive can be installed in various configurations of opentext content suite and documentum environments.
